item.title: Hacking the simplest database
item.description: Julia Evans proposed the simplest database, let's take it down! A casestudy of simple file manipulations in bash.

item.title: Fixing video noise with sox
item.description: How to use sox for something simple and practical: fixing the noise in ayoutube video.

item.title: Why we need authenticated cryptography
item.description: Simple demonstration of how an attacker could tamper with an encryptedmessage to his benefit without ever decrypting it in the absence ofmessage authentication.

item.title: Privilege Escalations
item.description: How to identify flawed resource management leading to privilegeescalation. Part of the Fast Security Source Code Review series.

item.title: How secure is unpredictableSeed?
item.description: D's unpredictableSeed is sometimes used to compensate for the lack of aCSPRNG in the standard library. But how secure is that really?

item.title: Crypter writeup
item.description: "A file was encrypted. You have the encryption software and an encryptedfile. Decrypt that file." Detailed writeup using radare2.
